name: Ball Lightning
desc: Storm Spirit becomes volatile electricity, charging across the battlefield until he depletes his mana or reaches his target. The activation mana cost is 30+8% of his total mana pool, and the cost per 100 units traveled is 12+0.7% of his total mana pool.  Damage is expressed in damage per 100 units traveled.

name: Midnight Pulse
desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

name: Chaotic Offering
desc: Summons a Golem from the depths, stunning enemies for one second. The Golem lives 60 seconds, takes reduced damage from spells, has Permanent Immolation and Flaming Fists on attack. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Firestorm
desc: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.

name: Reincarnation
desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Healing Ward
desc: Summons a Healing Ward which heals all nearby allied units, based on their max health.  The Healing Ward moves at 420 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.

name: Moon Glaives
desc: Empowers Luna's glaives, causing her attacks to bounce between enemy units. Deals less damage with each bounce.

name: Marksmanship
desc: Drow's experiences in battle improve her accuracy and effectiveness in combat, providing a passive bonus to Agility. Grants no bonus if there are enemy heroes within 400 range. Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Overgrowth
desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

name: Phase Shift
desc: Puck briefly shifts into another dimension where it is immune from harm.
